benchmark_details.name: KIT-19 (A Comprehensive Korean Instruction Toolkit on 19 Tasks)
benchmark_details.overview: KIT-19 is a dataset created in an instruction format, comprising 19 existing open-source datasets for Korean NLP tasks, which aims to enhance and advance the performance of Korean Large Language Models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the data scarcity problem and reduce the reliance on translated or GPT-generated instructions for Korean LLMs.

data.source: Integrated from 19 existing Korean NLP datasets, each consisting of 5,000 examples.
data.annotation: Manually annotated based on specific task requirements.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated during evaluation on benchmark tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance on Korean NLP tasks.
